item.title: Desire
item.description: [[songs/p/pendulum/immersion/witchcraft.md#we-gotta-get-out-vyl-wnanory|We gotta get away and disappear]] [[songs/p/pendulum/immersion/witchcraft.md#we-gotta-get-out-vyl-wnanory|We’re running out of time]] [[songs/p/pendulum/immersion/witchcraft.md#we-gotta-get-out-vyl-wnanory|The sun is low we’ll go and break away]] [[songs/p/pendulum/immersion/witchcraft.

item.title: Forever Tonight
item.description: [[songs/p/perturbator/i_am_the_night/naked_tongues_feat_memory_ghosts_isabella_goloversic.md#i-have-waited-vyl-wnanory|I’ve been waiting all my life]] [[songs/p/perturbator/i_am_the_night/naked_tongues_feat_memory_ghosts_isabella_goloversic.md#i-have-waited-vyl-wnanory|For the moment to be right]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/lesser_man_extended_version/run.md#im-not-that-person-in-the-night-vyl-wnanory|You and me]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/lesser_man_extended_version/run.md#im-not-that-person-in-the-night-vyl-wnanory|Tonight could be the night]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/lesser_man_extended_version/run.

item.title: Naked Tongues
item.description: [[songs/s/sister_machine_gun/burn/burn.md#when-i-think-about-the-first-time-that-i-saw-your-face-vyl-wnanory|From the very first time I saw your face, I knew]] [[songs/s/sister_machine_gun/burn/burn.md#when-i-think-about-the-first-time-that-i-saw-your-face-vyl-wnanory|Though I never told you so]] [[songs/r/röyksopp/the_understanding/what_else_is_there.md#it-was-me-on-that-road-vyl-wnanory|And when I looked into your eyes I couldn’t help but see]] [[songs/r/röyksopp/the_understanding/what_else_is_there.
